public ref class ServicedComponent abstract : ContextBoundObject, IDisposable, System::EnterpriseServices::IRemoteDispatch, System::EnterpriseServices::IServicedComponentInfo

summary.span: 表示使用 COM+ 服务的所有类的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class of all classes using COM+ services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情况下，派生自的类将在 COM + 应用程序中的运行可能会停止响应。Under certain conditions, a class that is derived from that runs in a COM+ application may stop responding. 此问题是由活动死锁引起的。This problem is caused by an Activity deadlock. 在多线程应用程序由于异步清理组件引用的情况下，活动可以死锁。Activities can deadlock on multithreaded applications because of an asynchronous cleanup of component references. 若要解决此问题，请调用方法完成处理的对象派生自。To work around this problem, call the method when you complete work with objects derived from . 有关详细信息，请参阅[ http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb; en-我们; 327443](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443)。For more information, see [http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443). > [!NOTE] > 客户端的代码必须调用`Dispose`服务以确保正确地执行操作的组件上。Client code must call `Dispose` on serviced components to ensure proper operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何公开为已配置的 COM 组件的类。The following code example demonstrates how to expose a class as a configured COM component. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CPP/calculator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CS/calculator.cs#1)] 若要部署此类作为一个已配置的 COM 组件，必须生成一个强密钥、 编译为一个库，类和注册的库。To deploy this class as a configured COM component, you must generate a strong key, compile the class as a library, and register the library. 这三个步骤是通过以下三个命令来完成。These three steps are accomplished by the following three commands. ``` sn -k Calculator.snk csc /t:library Calculator.cs regsvcs Calculator.dll ```

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定对象，并删除关联的 COM + 上下文。Finalizes the object and removes the associated COM+ context. 建议垃圾回收器释放对象前显式释放 COM + 对象和外部资源。It is recommended to explicitly release COM+ objects and external resources before the garbage collector frees the object. 如果外部资源是不足或成本高昂，可以通过显式释放 COM + 资源，在不再需要时实现更好的性能。If the external resource is scarce or expensive, better performance can be achieved by explicitly releasing COM+ resources when they are no longer needed. 通过提供显式控制方法。Explicit control is provided by the method. 调用允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

para.span: 重写方法以自定义此类的释放逻辑。

span.span: Override the method to customize the dispose logic for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；否则为 ，这仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; otherwise, to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: void IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo (ref int infoMask, out string[] infoArray);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.EnterpriseServices.IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo(int32& infoMask, [out] string[]& infoArray) cil managed
Sub GetComponentInfo (ByRef infoMask As Integer, ByRef infoArray As String()) Implements IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo

param.name: infoMask
param.span: 一个位掩码，其中：0x00000001 为服务组件进程 ID 的键，0x00000002 为应用程序域 ID 的键，0x00000004 为服务组件远程 URI 的键。

span.span: A bitmask where 0x00000001 is a key for the serviced component's process ID, 0x00000002 is a key for the application domain ID, and 0x00000004 is a key for the serviced component's remote URI.

param.name: infoArray
param.span: 一个字符串数组，可以依次包含以下任一项或全部项：服务组件的进程 ID、应用程序域 ID 以及服务组件的远程 URI。

span.span: A string array that may contain any or all of the following, in order: the serviced component's process ID, the application domain ID, and the serviced component's remote URI.

summary.span: 获取关于 类实例的某些信息。

span.span: Obtains certain information about the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不属于的已发布界面类并不需要在其他位置实现。The method does not belong to the published interface of the class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
